title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Designing Nursing Curricula Reflecting Diverse Learning Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core competencies required in nursing education
Learners can diagnose their own learning styles and develop a learning plan that reflects them.
Learners can maintain participation rates of over 80% in self-directed learning utilizing digital tools (quiz platforms, simulations, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
